citation.title: Effectiveness of Bullying and Violence Prevention Programs

news.title: Why threats to get votes for health law are more workplace bullying than political tactics
news.summary: In an effort to pass the health care law, Donald Trump placed intense political pressure on members of the House, even telling one key lawmaker “I’m going to come after you,” according to reports.
